messages: RT @NerdPoetics: So who's ready for the Puppy Bowl?
RT @TheTweetOfGod: When your favorite sports team loses it's because I'm punishing you in particular.
Either Prince just commanded a butterfly to land on his shoulder or I've had too much Crown...
